Class FileBoundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.canoo.webtest.boundary.FileBoundary

  • public final class FileBoundary
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for working with files.
    Author:
    Paul King, Marc Guillemot

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public static java.io.File getFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                   java.lang.Class relativeClass)
        Helper method when creating files.
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename of the resource to get
        relativeClass - the class whose package contains the resource
        Returns:
        the File if it exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the file could not be found

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(java.io.File file)
        Gets the bytes of the file
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read
        Returns:
        the file content
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the content can't be read
